website_summaries.verdict: This model has a lot of power for a mid-size unit, so it can handle the needs of an average family without using a lot of counter space.
pros: 1,100 watts is a surprising amount of cooking power for a 1.4 cubic foot microwave
Pre-programmed instant start buttons for 1 to 6 minute cooking times
longer times can be entered manually
Interior is more spacious than we expected for a microwave of this size
cons: Some users report that the door open button wears out or begins to jam with frequent use

customer_reviews.title: GE products quality,  where has it gone?
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I have owned many GE small appliances. Before this, I had been happy and satisfied with their products. This one was never very impressive, flimsy and cheaply made with mediocre performance. In less than a year and a half, it's dead. It started with the light flickering and turning off, then wouldn't work until the light decided to come back on. No screen or button response until it did. Cue the horrible rattling and shaking. Then for the grand finale- light off, death rattle, and then, oddly, the timer started to continue to countdown, light on, and no sound or microwaving happening. Time for a replacement. GE, you've lost your touch.
customer_reviews.author: Moxxie

customer_reviews.title: Died 5 days past the 12 month warranty - GE stands behind their warranty!!!
customer_reviews.text: We love the features and functions of this product. We have 2 identical units for our office. However, the newer one just completed died 5 days past the 12 months from when we received it. The older one is about 3 years old and running perfectly. Fortunately, I called GE Customer Relations and they agreed to reimburse us for the purchase price towards a new microwave. They said they will normally honor a warranty up to 2 months past the 12 month warranty period. We will order the same model and hope it lasts several years like our original one. It is comforting to know GE will stand behind the product past the warranty period.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions provided are inaccurate, $100 restocking fee for a $125 item!
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to use it because the measurements were not exact. The return features a $100 restocking fee on a $125 item! I needed it to fit in a cutout in my new kitchen cabinet. If it was the height promised, it would have fit, however, there are four feet which are 1/8" pressed out of the bottom cover. Impossible to remove them, and taller than the specs. I kept it two years and eventually finished the basem Sent and used it in another location.
customer_reviews.author: FR

customer_reviews.title: Died after less than two years
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it 0 stars I would. Received this item 5/30/2015, it died 4/30/2017. Less than two years of service. Luckily, I had purchased the protection plan. If you're going to buy this microwave, I highly suggest that you do so also.
customer_reviews.author: TimetheAvenger

customer_reviews.title: wasted hours on the phone and e-mail and lost work ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an older version of the exact same product. It lasted 2 months. GE sent A&E repair out twice before they decided to send me a refund. I have now been two weeks without a working microwave, wasted hours on the phone and e-mail and lost work time waiting for the repairman.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: This microwave only lasted 3 years and 3 months. My last one worked for almost 8 years. It started turning on automatically.. After was totally turned off and we had walked away. Scary, fire hazard. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: Work great and looks nice. I replaced it with the same brand I had for many years. I use it in my bedroom with a small fridge as well (big house) The old one still worked fine but the paint was coming off on the inside. :Update well it started good but I had to return it because the plate motor stopped working. Now the replacement is acting up. Got an error message while popping a bag of popcorn. The rotisserie on this one is making noise and smells like electrical burning. Avoid buying this model it has defects.
customer_reviews.author: J. Silva

customer_reviews.title: ... replacement for one that gave us many years of great service and I was surprised that I could still ...
customer_reviews.text: This was an exact replacement for one that gave us many years of great service and I was surprised that I could still get that model. Since we had long learned the "ins & outs" of the units capabilities and buttons, it was a slam dunk to get a unit that we were already familiar with and that served us well. Amazon came through and we had it in a couple of days. Not easy to be without a microwave once you get accustomed to their speed for quick and easy .
customer_reviews.author: Ron Hamric

customer_reviews.title: Just don't build things like they used to
customer_reviews.text: I had my previous microwave for over 25 years and that isn't no lie! Bought this microwave and had it for less then 6 months and now waiting for over a week for a repair man to come out ! Just don't build things like they used to!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Chatfield

customer_reviews.title: Good luck getting a refund from GE
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these microwaves. When the first on died after 3 mo, I thought it was a fluke. Being restricted on the size, I purchased the same oven a 2nd time, which lasted 5 months. GE would not give me a dime either time. This oven is a defective piece of junk, which should be recalled. DON'T BUY THIS OVEN, IT WILL FAIL AFTER ONLY A FEW MONTHS. GE WILL NOT GIVE YOU A CREDIT OR OFFER A REFUND.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Ostgaard

customer_reviews.title: ... be NEW but when unit came the box looked like it went through world war 3 and there was ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to return item was supposed to be NEW but when unit came the box looked like it went through world war 3 and there was small dent on side and small chip on turntable plate.
customer_reviews.author: William Cooper

customer_reviews.title: I no way should you waste money on this product or seller
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS! I purchased this in April 2018, less than two months later the electronic keypad stopped functioning and the seller citied it was past the warranty. I expect microwaves to last a little bit longer than two months on minimal usage. I can see by the other reviews that this is not the first time. I no way should you waste money on this product or seller.
customer_reviews.author: Sherpa

customer_reviews.title: I got this one just like the other one!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this microwave because I have this same brand at our other house and it works just fine. Was easier for my husband to transfer to as well:) It's got everything I need, 1100 watts, rotating tray, size goes great on my kitchen counter. It fit all my needs!
customer_reviews.author: Melody Strom

customer_reviews.title: Its a good solid build
customer_reviews.text: This oven worked well, lights up when the door opens, too. It defrosted my hamburger meat perfectly. Its a good solid build. I don't know why others have complained so much. The door opens easily. This is my second one (the first lasted years and it was just time to replace it). I could not find another oven here that sounded as good as this one. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn P.

customer_reviews.title: Last 5 to 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 microwaves. One went out in 5 months and the other microwave lasted 6 months. Try another brand or model. Amazon has a 30 day refund policy and GE would not refund both microwaves.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Williams

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I had a same size GE microwave that lasted ten years. When i received this one, it is not as sturdy, and have trouble closing the door, requiring two hands to shut it. On occasion we have trouble opening the door. The quality of this microwave is definitely not as good as the one i bought 10 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Godwin Noell

customer_reviews.title: Not a good microwave.
customer_reviews.text: This microwave only lasted about 2 weeks before the wires inside started burning up. This is the second microwave that did that. So beware you your thinking about ordering this microwave.
customer_reviews.author: EEB

customer_reviews.title: It's just okay.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this due to the size which is perfect for the shelf in our kitchen. The rotating plate assembly makes strange noises at times. It cooks fine. I don't hate it, but I don't love it either.
customer_reviews.author: Jue Peter

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this one to replace exact same microwave in November and now in August it simply quit working......fool me once, shame on you...fool me twice, shame on me! WILL NOT do it again! DO NOT BUY this machine.
customer_reviews.author: coffee drinker in NC

customer_reviews.title: Hey microwave. Cook my potatoe PERFECT and dont let it shrink or stick to turntable glass!
customer_reviews.text: Very basic and dated looking because it is the ssme controls, foods to choose, time buttons on every single microwave. Need something alittle more hi tech for this day and age
customer_reviews.author: Mtchristian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent microwave
customer_reviews.text: This is a great microwave for the price. There is a lot of room inside, enough for an average dinner plate, but the counter space is minimal. The express feature for heating one minute by pushing "1," two minutes by pushing "2," etc., is very useful. The reheat is also excellent. The only complaint I have yet is that the controls are a little hard to read. Greater contrast with the background would be useful. All in all, a very fine microwave and very easy to set up and use. Have barely needed to consult the manual.
customer_reviews.author: Stevan Davies

customer_reviews.title: My new Microwave
customer_reviews.text: The whole reason I went with GE was because I just threw out my last microwave from GE and that one lasted 19 years. This has more levels on it but I am trying all the levels hopefully before the winter sets in. A very good product!!!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: We had had this microwave for about 6 months when it completely stopped working one day. Pretty disappointing. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Aidan

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I bought this microwave to replace our older one that had died. It’s easy to use and works well, but after 8 weeks it started cutting out in the middle of heating. Two weeks later it’s done.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: We would not recommend this microwave
customer_reviews.text: We bought this microwave in March 2015. It totally and permanently quit working in the middle of our Thanksgiving dinner 2015. We asked the opinion of a repairman. He said it was not worth fixing. We would not recommend this microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but I love it! The instant minute buttons (up to 6) ...
customer_reviews.text: Havent even had a chance to use the more swanky options, but I love it! The instant minute buttons (up to 6) and 'add 30sec' are fantastic, and the food heats evenly and quickly. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is Junk
customer_reviews.text: bought it,and it is broken before even six months is over. i think this guys sold me junk. i need my money back
customer_reviews.author: malo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome microwave
customer_reviews.text: The best microwave I have ever owned. Heats fast and not hard to operate. I would highly recommend this microwave!!!! Great price as well
customer_reviews.author: A. Langs

customer_reviews.title: Great microwave
customer_reviews.text: It has all the featured I like in a microwave!
customer_reviews.author: I. Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last!
customer_reviews.text: Crapped out exactly around a year. When I called GE they said since it wasn't under warranty it would cost $100 for a device person to look at it. What a rip off. Get another microwave if you want one that lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Wood

customer_reviews.title: I enjoyed the microwave
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed the microwave. I liked the exterior, and the automatic buttons... but its not even a year old and it quit on me. No Pop corn for me tonight!
customer_reviews.author: ResidentEvilLover

customer_reviews.title: Great Microwave Features
customer_reviews.text: Lots of features that help fine tune cooking. Nice appearance.
customer_reviews.author: gmshero

customer_reviews.title: seemed like good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: it was exactly same size as previous oven,just a little smaller inside.seemed like good value for the money,hope this lasts 15 yrs like the first did. arrived before expected delivery date. would recommend to a friend
customer_reviews.author: mark brame

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable !
customer_reviews.text: It has been less than 2 years and it no longer heats items. The timer et al works but no heat. VERY disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Microwave continues to run after timer has stopped. This ...
customer_reviews.text: Microwave continues to run after timer has stopped. This happened less than 4 months after I purchased. Part was repaired and then it did the same thing 3 months later.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great microwave for the money
customer_reviews.text: I chose five star rating cause is a no mistake microwave. For reheat you do not have to set temps, this microwave does it automatically. I don't care for how the door sticks every now then, but this a minor problem. It has a large glass turntable, & is very roomy inside. I would and have recommended this microwave to family & friends.
customer_reviews.author: Eunice M. LaSpisa

customer_reviews.title: User Friendly Appliance
customer_reviews.text: Very user friendly and easy to understand controls. Large cook area and quiet operation. Nice clean appearance and reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: gsi10

customer_reviews.title: I do not like this.
customer_reviews.text: GE Micro Wave Oven is so light in weight that it keeps moving on the counter top back and forth. Never seen such a light weight unit. I do not like this.
customer_reviews.author: Brij Agarwal

customer_reviews.title: Works well, good replacement for prior version
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect replacement for a prior model. . Exacly the same size, which was important to us as it had to fit into a cabinet. There is a slight reconfiguration of the express buttons but nothing to drastic.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Kalman

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Defective product. Its a shock Amazon is still offering this model to customers.
customer_reviews.author: oceanblue

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed bye the microwave unit
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed bye the microwave unit. These door does not open or close freely. One of the legs was loose. I had to balance the product with a piece of cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great microwave.
customer_reviews.text: Great small microwave. Small in size but plenty of power,
customer_reviews.author: Peter O'connor

customer_reviews.text: Excellent service! Arrived within two days after ordered. Works as advertised. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Hollie Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: I love my purchase. It was exactly what I needed for my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Onn

customer_reviews.title: But the delivery was great.
customer_reviews.text: I can only rate it high if it lasts a long time but we just got it. But the delivery was great.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Zatopek

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: We first chose it because of its size. It fit perfectly in the spot we wanted to place it. We are very pleased, for its size, with its cooking ability. We will wait and see how it functions over the long haul.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: Energy efficient, value for your money
customer_reviews.text: I first saw this microwave at a client's office. I was impressed with the way in which it evenly heats food. No more frozen entrees that only cook at the outer edges leaving the middle half frozen. Easy to use. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Lady CPA

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect on a small table in our kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect on a small table in our kitchen. Quiet and good energy to get things done in a reasonable but fast way. the footing is not so good. it keeps sliding back on our table and we have pull it up every couple of days. Need to improve footing to make it stay in one place. Other then that it is a 5 stay performance.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Just ok.
customer_reviews.text: It has turned out to be an OK Microwave. The power is good. But I think countertop microwaves are not make as well as wall mounted one. It moves around when you open and close the door. The door does not open or close easily. You need to push it in with some force to close it and hold the oven in place when you press the door release to open it. I would not have bought it had I known this.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Dow

customer_reviews.title: MW
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I ordered. Love it. So easy to use, even for the grandchildren.Just mash Bev to scramble an egg...
customer_reviews.author: angelalhartley

product_meta.title: GE APPLIANCES JES1460DSBB Countertop Microwave, 1.4 cu. ft, black
product_meta.description: GE appliances provide up-to-date technology and exceptional quality to simplify the way you live. With a timeless appearance, this family of appliances is ideal for your family. And, coming from one of the most trusted names in America, you know that this entire selection of appliances is as advanced as it is practical. 1.4 cu. ft. capacity 1100-Watt (IEC-705 test procedure) Sensor cooking controls automatically adjusts time and power for delicious cooking results Weight and time defrost simply enter the weight of the food and the oven automatically sets the optimal defrosting time and power level or set your desired time for defrosting Turntable rotates food throughout the cooking cycle for even cooking results Instant on controls where cooking and reheating happens instantly at the touch of a button Control lockout provides peace of mind by locking the oven and preventing accidental activation Timer on/off so oven timer can be set to countdown a specific amount of minutes to help watch the time for you Power cord Length 36 in. Push button open. BLACK

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.2 out of 5 stars126 ratings3.2 out of 5 stars
